ROOT.GetTokenInfo: select I.TOKEN_ID,S.DCLOUD_ID AS STID,S.DCLOUD_NAME AS STNAME,D.TOKEN_NO,D.NAME AS TOKENNAME,D.TOKEN_TYPE,I.DEVICE_ID,I.NOTE from OSP_AHCLOUD.TOKEN_INFO I JOIN OSP_AHCLOUD.TOKEN_DEFINE D ON I.TOKEN_NO=D.TOKEN_NO JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_SUBSTATION_C S ON I.ST_ID=S.D5000_ID ORDER BY S.DCLOUD_ID
ROOT.GetDevNameOfType: SELECT D5000_NAME FROM SG_DEV_DIS_C C WHERE D5000_ID={0}
ROOT.GetDeviceName1: SELECT D5000_NAME FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_C C WHERE D5000_ID={0} UNION ALL SELECT D5000_NAME FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_BREAKER_C C WHERE D5000_ID={0} UNION ALL SELECT D5000_NAME FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_BUSBAR_C C WHERE D5000_ID={0} UNION ALL SELECT D5000_NAME FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINE_C C WHERE D5000_ID={0} UNION ALL SELECT D5000_NAME FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_GENERATOR_C C WHERE D5000_ID={0} UNION ALL SELECT D5000_NAME FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_GROUNDDIS_C C WHERE D5000_ID={0} UNION ALL SELECT D5000_NAME FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DIS_C C WHERE D5000_ID={0} UNION ALL SELECT D5000_NAME FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_PWRTRANSFM_C C WHERE D5000_ID={0} UNION ALL SELECT D5000_NAME FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_TRANSFMWD_C C WHERE D5000_ID={0} UNION ALL SELECT D5000_NAME FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_SERIESREACTOR_C C WHERE D5000_ID={0} UNION ALL SELECT D5000_NAME FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_SERIESCAPACITOR_C C WHERE D5000_ID={0} UNION ALL SELECT D5000_NAME FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_SHUNTREACTOR_C C WHERE D5000_ID={0} UNION ALL SELECT D5000_NAME FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_SHUNTCAPACITOR_C C WHERE D5000_ID={0} UNION ALL SELECT D5000_NAME FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_SVC_C C WHERE D5000_ID={0} UNION ALL SELECT D5000_NAME FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_SVG_C C WHERE D5000_ID={0} UNION ALL SELECT D5000_NAME FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_SYNCCONDENSER_C C WHERE D5000_ID={0}
